[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [Events](./blockly.events_namespace.md) &gt; [Click](./blockly.events_namespace.click_class.md) &gt; [(constructor)](./blockly.events_namespace.click_class._constructor__1_constructor.md)

## Events.Click.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `Click` class

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(opt_block?: Block | null, opt_workspaceId?: string | null, opt_targetType?: ClickTarget);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  opt\_block | [Block](./blockly.block_class.md) \| null | _(Optional)_ The affected block. Null for click events that do not have an associated block (i.e. workspace click). Undefined for a blank event. |
|  opt\_workspaceId | string \| null | _(Optional)_ The workspace identifier for this event. Not used if block is passed. Undefined for a blank event. |
|  opt\_targetType | [ClickTarget](./blockly.events_namespace.clicktarget_enum.md) | _(Optional)_ The type of element targeted by this click event. Undefined for a blank event. |
